name: Presence (Darkysel)
description:
Presence, a game made for CraftJam 4

All used assets are self made by me and my teammate Cleveri

Is a bit buggy tho D:

Game Controls :

  • F - Interact : Pickup items, activate elevators..
  • Movement : WASD - Space for the jumping
  • I - Open Inventory Manager, it has 4 tabs:
    • Inventory: Has item descriptions, can drop selected items
    • Crafting: The crafting interface, double click to move the item into the crafting "table"
    • Equipment: In this tab, you can double click equippable items to move them into the Hot Equip menu (Displayed using E in game)
    • History: Shows history of any dialogue (There's barely any atm)
  • E - Hot Equip: in this interface you can click any item to equip it (Light Flower drops down and lights up upon clicking!)

Crafting Recipes:

  • Beam Light :
    • Small Magnifier
    • Compressed Light
    • Long Base x2
  • Charger :
    • Wire x2
    • Compressed Power
  • Flash Bomb :
    • Compressed Power
    • Round Base
    • Small Magnifier
    • Releaser
  • Light Bomb :
    • Wire
    • Round Base
    • Compressed Light
    • Releaser
  • Light Flower :
    • Compressed Light
    • Flower
  • Shockwave Beam :
    • Magnifier
    • Compressed Power
    • Long Base x2
    • Releaser
  • Shockwave Beam :
    • Magnifier
    • Beam Light
  • Signal Flare :
    • Flare Base
    • Mixture
  • Key Items :
    • Crafting using specific fragments found in game
